title: A pdc-pinched copper complex for sustainable hydrogen production through ligand supported-metal centric proton-coupled electron transfer
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00953C, Paper
Meena Chettri, Subhajit Saha, Nilankar Diyali, Rakesh Debnath, Harshita Bagdwal, Monika Singh, Bhaskar Biswas
A water-stable [Cu(pdc)(H2O)2] complex, promising functional mimics of hydrogenase active sites and promoting sustainable hydrogen production in acidic water has been designed and synthesised using an ONO-type pincer ligand, 2,6-pyridine...
